Text.Page:
Don't look so glum!

Everyone around here is depressed because it's a thankless, career-killing post miles away from the argon front. It's all that, sure, but it's also an opportunity!

The secret is the {@LinkCreature:10#4#lumbering kamaras}. I know a guy in Castanica who knows a guy, and that guy wants their shells. No idea why, but we're being paid well enough not to ask.
<PCNAME>, this could be the beginning of a profitable friendship.
You aren't allergic to gold, are you? Then get out there and carve up some {@LinkCreature:10#4#kamaras}!
